H0.text: Who discovered the planet Uranus. Galileo Galilei

H1.text: Who discovered the planet Uranus. Isaac Newton

H2.text: Who discovered the planet Uranus. Johannes Kepler

H3.text: Who discovered the planet Uranus. Herschelian

A4.text: William Herschel first observed Uranus on 13 March 1781, leading to its discovery as a planet

A5.text: The discovery of Uranus was the first planet to be discovered since antiquity

A6.text: The discovery of Uranus was confirmed by verification and consultation with other astronomers
